subroutine quicksort(arr, first, last)
    integer :: arr(first:last)
    integer :: first, last
    integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

    i = first
    j = last
    pivot = arr((first + last)/2) 

    do
        do while (arr(i) < pivot) i = i + 1
        end do
        do while (arr(j) > pivot)
            j = j - 1
        end do
        if (i <= j) then
            temp = arr(i)
            arr(i) = arr(j)
            arr(j) = temp i = i + 1
            j = j - 1
        end if
        if (i > j) exit
    end do

    if (first < j) call quicksort(arr, first, j)
    if (i < last) call quicksort(arr, i, last)
